title: Memory dump analysis with Signal decryption
summary: A deep-dive into Signal’s move to safeStorage API and how an HTB forensic content engineer creates a CTF Challenge.

title: Operation Tinsel Trace II: Join the resistance against Krampus!
summary: Krampus has left some gifts for Santa, it turns out—it’s malware.

title: The many ways to obtain credentials in AWS
summary: Dive into the complexities of AWS IAM credentials and uncover how defenders can stay ahead with in-depth knowledge of SDK behaviors and service-specific mechanisms.
